name: string/Handlebar style template filler

85041f66-7ce0-4265-8471-96cfb773b878.name: template
85041f66-7ce0-4265-8471-96cfb773b878.description:
Receives the template string to replace parameters in.

Example:
"Hello {{subject}}!"

1e9967ed-2371-4814-8cc5-7b0515131c74.name: params

5c29911e-8f91-4922-9159-349baba6e2e9.name: filled
5c29911e-8f91-4922-9159-349baba6e2e9.description:
Sends the template string with replaced parameters.

Example:
"Hello world!"

7a9e0956-1617-4649-b404-02f1451b7442.name: error

description:
Substitutes parameters into a template. Parameters are marked by Handlebars style tokens.

Example:

1. "Hello {{subject}}!"@0 is received via `template`
2. {"subject":"world"}@0 is received via params
3. "Hello world!"@0 is sent via `filled`
